Subjects: hell, pains of; death, fear of
_description: On the pains of hellfire, titled ‘De penis inferni’ — eight lines in couplets

OxfMert248.First Lines:
fire colde and tereshatyngdrede worme and
                    weping…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…nythe dede wyt oten hendeþis wil manis saule
                    sthende
